uk.co.crider.jablus.models.dairy.env.field

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.crider.jablus.data.CompoundData
      • uk.co.crider.jablus.models.dairy.env.field.Field
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Data, DataSet, DriverEndogeneous

    public class Field
extends CompoundData
implements DriverEndogeneous
    Class to represent a farmer's field, includes crop/soil models
